body_html:
Sorry you're hitting problems! It looks like your immediate problem is that you're running the script with the working directory set to tensorflow/contrib/makefile, e.g. you've done this:

git clone https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow
cd tensorflow/tensorflow/contrib/makefile
sh compile_ios_tensorflow.sh

What you should actually do is this:

git clone https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow
cd tensorflow
tensorflow/contrib/makefile/compile_all_ios.sh

The documentation is at https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/tree/master/tensorflow/contrib/makefile#ios but I realize that is a bit unclear about which directory to run the scripts from, so we should improve that.

Does that help?

body:
Sorry you're hitting problems! It looks like your immediate problem is that you're running the script with the working directory set to tensorflow/contrib/makefile, e.g. you've done this:

``` bash
git clone https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow
cd tensorflow/tensorflow/contrib/makefile
sh compile_ios_tensorflow.sh
```

What you should actually do is this:

``` bash
git clone https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow
cd tensorflow
tensorflow/contrib/makefile/compile_all_ios.sh
```

The documentation is at https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/tree/master/tensorflow/contrib/makefile#ios but I realize that is a bit unclear about which directory to run the scripts from, so we should improve that. 

Does that help?
